title: Another Typeface ID Needed
content:
Hi everyone,

Can anyone identify the typeface used for ’wheels’ in their logo.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.wheels.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040208/http:/typophile.com/files/logo.wheels.gif) | 2 KB |

 [‹ Font Used on Oprah Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040208/http:/typophile.com/node/48790 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type ID: Old Slab face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040208/http:/typophile.com/node/48599 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bjk

comments.content:
Yeah I would say that’s very close. The l is what is a bit different, but actually what I liked the most.

Thanks again for your help. I will need to start sending you compensation soon.
